r.d: Parses BBCode mark-up to tokenize the text for Text_Wiki rendering (Xhtml, plain, Latex) or for conversions using the existing renderers (wiki).
r.n:
* List: Swallow away line breaks within the lists which produced unwanted
* List: Starting count by zero as Xhtml render relies on it (erroneous at begin) * Really add superscript and subscript extensions (forgoten in package file list)
